mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT lxbs from jjg_zdh_pzd where proname = #{proname} and htd = #{htd}
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT cd) from jjg_zdh_pzd where proname = #{proname} and htd = #{htd} and lxbs=#{zx}

SELECT pzd.*,sd.name,sd.pzlx from (SELECT * from jjg_zdh_pzd where proname = #{proname} and htd = #{htd} and cd LIKE '左幅%' and lxbs=#{zx} and qdzh >= #{zhq} and qdzh <= #{zhz}) pzd LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM jjg_lqs_sd where proname = #{proname} and zhq = #{zhq} and zhz = #{zhz} and lf = '左幅' and wz=#{zx}) sd ON pzd.proname=sd.proname ORDER BY pzd.qdzh,FIELD(pzd.cd, ${result})

SELECT pzd.*,sd.name,sd.pzlx from (SELECT * from jjg_zdh_pzd where proname = #{proname} and htd = #{htd} and cd LIKE '右幅%' and lxbs=#{zx} and qdzh >= #{zhq} and qdzh <= #{zhz}) pzd LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM jjg_lqs_sd where proname = #{proname} and zhq = #{zhq} and zhz = #{zhz} and lf = '右幅' and wz=#{zx}) sd ON pzd.proname=sd.proname ORDER BY pzd.qdzh,FIELD(pzd.cd, ${result})

SELECT * from jjg_zdh_pzd where proname = #{proname} and htd = #{htd} and lxbs = #{zx} ORDER BY zdbs,qdzh

SELECT pzd.*,sd.name,sd.pzlx from (SELECT * from jjg_zdh_pzd where proname = #{proname} and htd = #{htd} and lxbs=#{zx} and qdzh >= #{zhq} and qdzh <= #{zhz}) pzd LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM jjg_lqs_sd where proname = #{proname} and zhq = #{zhq} and zhz = #{zhz} and wz=#{zx}) sd ON pzd.proname=sd.proname ORDER BY pzd.qdzh,FIELD(pzd.cd,${result})

SELECT pzd.*,sd.name,sd.pzlx from ( SELECT * from jjg_zdh_pzd where proname = #{proname} and cd LIKE '${lf}%' and lxbs=#{zx} AND zdbs=#{bz} and qdzh >= #{zhq1} and qdzh <= #{sdzhz}) pzd LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM jjg_lqs_sd where proname = #{proname} and zdbz=#{bz} and zhq = #{zhq1} and zhz = #{zhz1} and lf = #{lf} and wz=#{zx}) sd ON pzd.proname=sd.proname ORDER BY pzd.qdzh
